extendedInfo.description: Sell your used textbooks to the Dalhousie University Bookstore using this instant price quote app! It allows you to scan the barcodes of books that you'd like to sell using your phone's camera. You'll find out instantly how much we'll pay you for your used books. Please note: This application is able to use your camera to scan barcodes, however the camera on IPod Touch doesn't have the resolution to capture barcodes reliably. But, you can always type in your ISBN. If you have any trouble, please let us know!  Prices quoted through the App can change at any time without notice.

reviews.title: good app,  bad dal
reviews.comment: great app for anyone who wants to come to the realization that they shoild never sell any books back to the dalhousie bookstore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: App works fine. Good thing it\'s free I wouldn\'t be able to afford it considering a book I paid $160 not even 4 months ago is now only worth $19. Go Dal...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Htc one v
reviews.comment: Works, though I am not one to sell my books back in the first place.
